data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 16,940 believers in Essequibo Islands-West Demerara and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Essequibo Islands-West Demerara, Guyana
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: There are 107,800 people living in the state of Essequibo Islands-West Demerara. Only about 16,940 might be believers.

data.section_summary: On average, 7 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Essequibo Islands-West Demerara, Guyana.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Essequibo Islands-West Demerara to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Essequibo Islands-West Demerara you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Urdu people might believe through him.
Father, bless the state of Essequibo Islands-West Demerara with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 107,800 souls in Essequibo Islands-West Demerara and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Essequibo Islands-West Demerara, Guyana.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Essequibo Islands-West Demerara
location.people_groups_list: Macushi, Han Chinese, Hakka, Sarnami Hindi, Pemon, Taulipang, Han Chinese, Cantonese
